description: Save time, effort and money by selecting a clean, consistent and top-notch icon set.

testimonials.name: Untitled UI
testimonials.text: We love this icon set for a few reasons. They're super minimal and consistent which means they'll work well across any type of web design or UI design project. Clearly crafted with care by a professional and easy to customize right in Figma!

testimonials.name: Designer.tips
testimonials.text: Majesticons is a great tool for designers that are looking for an easy way to create visuals. It comes with high quality templates, icons and illustrations in different formats.

testimonials.name: Hugeicons
testimonials.text: Majesticons was crafted to offer both premium and open-source communities with meticulously designed high quality icons.
